flavor: I can see the threads. I know when they will snap.
name: Arbiter of Fates
real_text:
Jacqueline Fine deck only.
[reaction] When you use Jacqueline Fine's [reaction] ability, exhaust Arbiter of Fates: This use of her ability does not count towards its limit.
text:
Jacqueline Fine deck only.
[reaction] When you use Jacqueline Fine's [reaction] ability, exhaust Arbiter of Fates: This use of her ability does not count towards its limit.

name: Dark Future
real_text: Revelation - Put Dark Future into play in your threat area. You cannot cancel or ignore [elder_sign], [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], and [auto_fail] tokens. Forced - At the end of your turn: Reveal 5 random tokens from the chaos bag. If an [elder_sign] symbol is revealed, discard Dark Future.
text: Revelation - Put Dark Future into play in your threat area. You cannot cancel or ignore [elder_sign], [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], and [auto_fail] tokens. Forced - At the end of your turn: Reveal 5 random tokens from the chaos bag. If an [elder_sign] symbol is revealed, discard Dark Future.

name: Nihilism
real_text: Revelation - Put Nihilism into play in your threat area. Forced - After you reveal, cancel, or ignore an [auto_fail] token: Take 1 damage and 1 horror. [action][action]: Discard Nihilism.
text: Revelation - Put Nihilism into play in your threat area. Forced - After you reveal, cancel, or ignore an [auto_fail] token: Take 1 damage and 1 horror. [action][action]: Discard Nihilism.

flavor: The wax tapers give off an eerie glow, and the flames move as if they are alive.
name: Ritual Candles
real_text: [reaction] After a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during a test you are performing: You get +1 skill value for this test.
text: [reaction] After a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during a test you are performing: You get +1 skill value for this test.

name: Scrying Mirror
real_text: Uses (4 secrets). [reaction] After a skill test at your location begins, exhaust Scrying Mirror and spend 1 secret: Perform the "reveal chaos token" step of the test now (before committing cards), instead of after committing cards.
text: Uses (4 secrets). [reaction] After a skill test at your location begins, exhaust Scrying Mirror and spend 1 secret: Perform the "reveal chaos token" step of the test now (before committing cards), instead of after committing cards.

name: Azure Flame
real_text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this attack, take 1 damage.
text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this attack, take 1 damage.

name: Clairvoyance
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this investigation, take 1 horror.
text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this investigation, take 1 horror.

name: Ineffable Truth
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the evaded enemy. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 resource.
text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the evaded enemy. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 resource.

flavor: "Thou art wholly unworthy. But I shall serve thee for now."
name: Familiar Spirit
real_text: You have 1 additional arcane slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Spell]] asset.
text: You have 1 additional arcane slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Spell]] asset.

name: Crystal Pendulum
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After a skill test at your location begins, exhaust Crystal Pendulum: Name a number. If this test succeeds by that number or fails by that number, draw 1 card.
text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After a skill test at your location begins, exhaust Crystal Pendulum: Name a number. If this test succeeds by that number or fails by that number, draw 1 card.

flavor: Dark is the abyss without. Bright is the abyss within.
name: Robes of Endless Night
real_text: [reaction] When you play a [[Spell]] card, exhaust Robes of Endless Night: Reduce the cost of that card by 1.
text: [reaction] When you play a [[Spell]] card, exhaust Robes of Endless Night: Reduce the cost of that card by 1.

flavor: Extradimensional travel had its risks, he knew. But who could resist the frontiers beyond time and space?
name: Astral Travel
real_text: Move. Move to any revealed location and reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, you must discard an [[Item]] or [[Ally]] asset you control (if you cannot, take 1 damage).
text: Move. Move to any revealed location and reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, you must discard an [[Item]] or [[Ally]] asset you control (if you cannot, take 1 damage).

name: Hypnotic Gaze
real_text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack. Then, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, deal the attacking enemy's damage to itself.
text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack. Then, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, deal the attacking enemy's damage to itself.

flavor: "If I said that I could tell you when you were going to die, would you want to know?"
name: Parallel Fates
real_text: Look at the top 4 cards of the encounter deck. Reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, shuffle those cards into the encounter deck. Otherwise, return them to the top of the encounter deck in any order.
text: Look at the top 4 cards of the encounter deck. Reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, shuffle those cards into the encounter deck. Otherwise, return them to the top of the encounter deck in any order.

name: Voice of Ra
real_text: Gain 1 resource. Reveal 3 random tokens from the chaos bag. For each [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol revealed, gain an additional 2 resources.
text: Gain 1 resource. Reveal 3 random tokens from the chaos bag. For each [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol revealed, gain an additional 2 resources.

flavor: The secrets were written in the stars.
name: Dark Prophecy
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would reveal a chaos token.
Reveal 5 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose one of those tokens with a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol to resolve, and ignore the rest. (If no such token is revealed, choose any one of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the rest.)
text:
Fast. Play when you would reveal a chaos token.
Reveal 5 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose one of those tokens with a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol to resolve, and ignore the rest. (If no such token is revealed, choose any one of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the rest.)

name: Defiance
real_text: Before revealing chaos tokens for this test, choose one of the following symbols: ([skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing]). Ignore the effects of the chosen symbol during this test (including its modifier).
text: Before revealing chaos tokens for this test, choose one of the following symbols: ([skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing]). Ignore the effects of the chosen symbol during this test (including its modifier).

name: Prescient
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
After you commit Prescient to a skill test, name "even," "odd," or "symbol." After this test ends, if a chaos token of the named type was revealed during this test, you may return a [[Spell]] card from your discard pile to your hand.
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
After you commit Prescient to a skill test, name "even," "odd," or "symbol." After this test ends, if a chaos token of the named type was revealed during this test, you may return a [[Spell]] card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Eldritch Inspiration
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would resolve an effect on a [mystic] card that triggers "when," "if," or "after" a chaos token is revealed.
Either cancel that effect, or resolve it an additional time.
text:
Fast. Play when you would resolve an effect on a [mystic] card that triggers "when," "if," or "after" a chaos token is revealed.
Either cancel that effect, or resolve it an additional time.

name: Grotesque Statue
real_text:
Uses (3 charges). If Grotesque Statue has no charges, discard it.
[reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token, spend 1 charge: Reveal 2 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose one of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the other.
text:
Uses (3 charges). If Grotesque Statue has no charges, discard it.

name: Recharge
real_text: Choose a [[Spell]] or [[Relic]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location and reveal a random chaos token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, add 1 charge to the chosen asset. Otherwise, add 4 charges to the chosen asset.
